summary: Dedicated, optimistic and highly motivated medical professional with a passion for quality clinical research. ECFMG Certified Foreign MD with extensive scientific and medical knowledge. Over 15 years of Phase 1 to 4 research experience with IND and medical device in both adult and pediatric clinical trials. Experienced in complying with ICH-GCP and FDA guidelines with strong attention to details. Well-organized and hardworking with excellent interpersonal, communication and problem-solving skills. Ability to engage in high-level scientific discussions on drug therapy and disease states in both academic and hospital-based settings. A team-player who is adaptable to change, fast-paced environment and prepared to surmount work challenges. Committed to tasks that will have the greatest impact on others, with the main goal of helping patients gain access to more effective medicines.

currentPositions.description:
Cancer Research Phase I Early Drug Development 

We offer a wide range of clinical trials, including novel targeted therapies, genomic based treatments, antibody-drug conjugates, and monoclonal antibodies for all advanced solid tumors, giving our patients access to cutting-edge cancer treatment options that are not widely available.
currentPositions.title: Clinical Research Supervisor- Team Lead

headline: Oncology Research Supervisor, ACRP Leader, Chapter President

publications.name: Prognostic Factors for Seizures in Pediatric Patients Admitted at Jose Reyes Memorial Medical Center

message.text: Happy Clinical Trials Day 2024, celebrating the trailblazers among us! As clinical researchers, we play crucial roles in promoting high quality research and protecting our patients. Together we bring new reasons for hope to patients and their families by providing more effective treatments to those who need it most. Thanks to all the scientists, researchers and healthcare professionals who make medical breakthroughs possible and improve patient outcomes 🧬❤️🔬

commentary.text: You’re such an inspiration! Thanks for reminding us to take every opportunity to live our lives to the fullest 💕🐾🏖️🌺
